divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming home from work heading west on HWY 160 When I noticed a VERY BRIGHT gold object in the sky. I did not think anything of it at first and thought it was a plane. But as I kept driving and getting closer I knew from the BRIGHT glow that it was not a plane. ( I lived next to O'HARE airport for 25 years) The object appeared to be on the North side of the road. It was hard to tell how high up it was ( did not appear to be very high ) or what shape the object was due to the fact of the BRIGHTNESS of the object. For some reason I did not pull over right a way but when I did and began looking for the object again I could not see it. There was no sound no vapor no nothing. A few days later I talked with some people I work with and one reported seeing a very bright object in the sky a few hours earlier. And the other said they saw a very bright object in the night sky moving the next day.
